title: Sampler Blanket #3
medium:
Medium: wool, polyester
Technique: needle punched wool and wool applique with machine embroidery
description: Dark brown background with bands of taupe and rose at the bottom.  In the center, a group of cutout "paper doll" figures in pink plaid.  In the lower left, a red patterned butterfly.  Red printed "x" shapes reminiscent of counted-stitch embroidery. Interlocking hearts machine embroidered in red.
name: Blanket
